comment: Hey guys, please read, I'm going to talk about my personal problems. Everything is getting worse and worse, my parents' fights are getting more and more frequent and worse, I'm not even impressed anymore, since I've witnessed these fights since I was little, and my psychology is almost finished, I just don't know what to do anymore, everything I do people look at me in a bad way, and I really hope that my new school helps me a little to have a minimum of happiness that I no longer have, I just want it all to end once and for all, I just want to cry but I can't, I want to smile but I can't, I don't feel any kind of emotion anymore, "hey but I saw you so happy, you talk to everyone normally." I just "try" to make people believe that I'm fine, but I'm not, it's just a mask hiding everything I'm feeling, I'm just standing, but I believe it will get better, if not I would have already "ended it all" if you know what I mean, but anyway, I just hope everything gets better, I still have a little hope that it will happen, thank you very much if you've read this far, it's just a personal rant. Thank you and good night.

When I first heard this song, I just fell in love with it and It automatically made me remember of my special person, but everything just changed between us now.. it made me miss our little late night talks, when I used to stay up late to wait for their texts, our sweet conversations, when I used to stay up to wait for their texts, their company, all the moments when we used to laughed sm together.. the smiles I get just from one text from them, and the way they made you feel loved.. it feels like a bittersweet ending in a story when you both didnâ€™t end up happily yet even in both of your separate ways.. thereâ€™s beautiful memories in those days you both had together,  despite the fights, misunderstandings, chaos that happened and youâ€™d wish you can bring back those days back when everything was okay between you two, but youâ€™re starting to slowly accept it now that it has to happen.. cause if itâ€™s meant to be, then it will be, but youâ€™re finally letting go and closing that chapter after holding on it for so long cause you canâ€™t accept it still.. and itâ€™s something that made you stronger and better person from those experiences. I just wanna write how this song makes me feel cause itâ€™s more than just a feeling that I canâ€™t describe, it feels so much to what Iâ€™m experiencing rn like memories flooding in remembering those happy moments you had with someone and even though youâ€™re finally accepting the way things turned out, they will forever be special to you and you will forever treasure those moments and somewhere deep in your heart and glimpse of hope that maybe.. maybe one day.. yaâ€™ll will meet one more time and you will be happy together again..

I liked this girl since the day she transferred to my school,her laugh,her voice,her smile...everything about her is just so perfect.I always stare at her all the time she's just so gorgeous I can't help it,i wish i could tell her my feelings but we have never talked before and i know she likes boys.And it feels so right yet so wrong because my family is Muslim,I'm an atheist and I don't think they would ever accept me,even though I don't believe in god I'm still scared because it's a sin and it also makes me feel bad to like girls as a girl.I tried really hard to like boys but she's just so kind and perfect,this song reminds me of her.I already know we will never be together and she won't ever like me back but I'll still love her.Maybe we could've been in another universe,but why not in this one?

I am 62, gay and male. I first heard this on some Tik Tok videos so I had to look it up (that line "I don't believe in God but I believe that your my savior" really stuck in my brain!) I know tons of people have heard this and thought it was a guy singing it! (Got to admit so did I!). Then when I finally heard the WHOLE SONG I was blown away! WOW! And that is was by a woman? MORE WOW!! The manufactured music of today is nothing I can really enjoy (for me, give me 60s-90s music and some post 2000 stuff, but that techno-synth-rap crap that it mostly out now is all the same) so when I hear what I consider a "clean" sound like this one, I can really enjoy it. And these are some of the BEST lyrics I have heard in a while! (like "We can run away to the walls inside your house" is very slick as well as "When you get a taste can you tell me what's my flavor? VERY SLICK!!) She talks about sex without hitting you over the head with it! I love that! And I love that it is woman-woman song!! Go GIGI!!
